text:
The following tools have been used extensively across audiovisual, marketing, CRM, data, and automation roles:

AV & Editing:
- Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, DaVinci Resolve
- ATEM Studio, ATEM Mini Extreme
- vMix, OBS Studio
- BMPCC cameras, Sony line, Panasonic Lumix
- Hollyland, LiveU, Teradek, Vaxis wireless systems

Marketing / Web:
- HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP
- WordPress, Drupal, Squarespace
- HandBrake, HBBatchBeast, ffmpeg
- Genie.AI, HubSpot, FiveCRM
- Zapier, Phantombuster, Monday.com, ActiveCampaign

Data / IT:
- SQL, MySQL, T-SQL, Access, VBA
- Powershell, Windows Server administration
- Cloudflare (Workers, Pages, DNS, Vectorize)
- AWS Glacier, Dropbox sync systems
- Git, GitHub

Jof demonstrates end-to-end capability across multiple disciplines and platforms.
